author: Bloomberg News
title: Food rationing is the new unnerving reality for grocery shoppers once spoiled for choice
description: North American shoppers are finding they can't get everything they want as grocery stores ration in-demand items to safeguard supplies
content:
At a Publix store in St. Petersburg, Florida, handmade signs limit customers to two packages of beef, pork and Italian sausage. In Toronto, shoppers at a west end Loblaws can’t buy more than two dozen eggs and two gallons of milk.
Spoiled for choice before t… [+3886 chars]
